verses.verse: "On my bed<WH4904> night<WH3915> after night I sought<WH1245> him Whom<WH7945> my soul<WH5315> loves;<WH157> I sought<WH1245> him but did not find<WH4672> him.

'I must arise<WH6965> now<WH4994> and go<WH5437> about<WH5437> the city;<WH5892> In the streets<WH7784> and in the squares<WH7339> I must seek<WH1245> him whom<WH7945> my soul<WH5315> loves.<WH157>' I sought<WH1245> him but did not find<WH4672> him.
"The watchmen<WH8104> who make<WH5437> the rounds<WH5437> in the city<WH5892> found<WH4672> me, [And I said,] 'Have you seen<WH7200> him whom<WH7945> my soul<WH5315> loves<WH157>?'

"Scarcely<WH4592> had I left<WH5674> them When<WH5704> <WH7945> I found<WH4672> him whom<WH7945> my soul<WH5315> loves;<WH157> I held<WH270> on to him and would not let<WH7503> him go,<WH7503> Until<WH5704> I had brought<WH935> him to my mother's house,<WH1004> And into the room<WH2315> of her who conceived<WH2029> me."

"I adjure<WH7650> you, O daughters<WH1323> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> By the gazelles<WH6643> or<WH176> by the hinds<WH355> of the field,<WH7704> That you will not arouse<WH5782> or awaken<WH5782> [my] love,<WH160> Until<WH5704> she pleases.<WH2654>"

"What<WH4310> is this<WH384> coming<WH5927> up from the wilderness<WH4057> Like columns<WH8490> of smoke,<WH6227> Perfumed<WH6999> with myrrh<WH4753> and frankincense,<WH3828> With all<WH3605> scented<WH81> powders<WH81> of the merchant<WH7402>?
"Behold,<WH2009> it is the [traveling] couch<WH4296> of Solomon;<WH8010> Sixty<WH8346> mighty<WH1368> men<WH1368> around<WH5439> it, Of the mighty<WH1368> men<WH1368> of Israel.<WH3478>

"All<WH3605> of them are wielders<WH270> of the sword,<WH2719> Expert<WH3925> in war;<WH4421> Each<WH376> man<WH376> has his sword<WH2719> at his side,<WH3409> [Guarding] against<WH4480> the terrors<WH6343> of the night.<WH3915>
"King<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> has made<WH6213> for himself a sedan<WH668> chair<WH668> From the timber<WH6086> of Lebanon.<WH3844>

"He made<WH6213> its posts<WH5982> of silver,<WH3701> Its back<WH7507> of gold<WH2091> [And] its seat<WH4817> of purple<WH713> fabric,<WH713> [With] its interior<WH8432> lovingly<WH160> fitted<WH7528> out By the daughters<WH1323> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

"Go<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> O daughters<WH1323> of Zion,<WH6726> And gaze<WH7200> on King<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> with the crown<WH5850> With which<WH7945> his mother<WH517> has crowned<WH5849> him On the day<WH3117> of his wedding,<WH2861> And on the day<WH3117> of his gladness<WH8057> of heart.<WH3820>"
